attributes.action: Force the issue of a Great Britain Football Team
attributes.additional_details: Petition for the UK Government to disband the English, Welsh, Scottish and Northern Irish Football associations at international level and force them to compete as Great Britain. None of the so called home nations have been showered in glory as individual parts, but the sum of these particular parts could result in the international glory all the home nations have been sorely lacking.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the football authorities in each part of the UK.
